articles.title: Wine with food may lower type 2 diabetes risk - Futurity: Research News
articles.description: A little bit of wine with dinner may lower your risk of type 2 diabetes, a new study shows. Beer and liquor have the opposite effect.
articles.content:
Drinking a little wine with dinner may help lower risks of developing type 2 diabetes, according to a new study.
